name: 7 Planets
description:
7 Planets is logic board game of rolling and matching wooden balls. It is based on Ziv Zav board game made in 1985.

You get old wooden box with 28 balls in 7 colors which you must place in correct rows. But be aware, balls are every time randomly placed and when one ball moves in a raw all others also move.

"Nifty puzzle game, which kept me amused for hours! Don’t let the simplicity put you off, the game play is fantastic..." - Wedocode

"Forget Connect Four or Solitaire marbles this is a game of logic, cunning and strategy and is a whole heap of fun." - iPhoneGlance

"Mind bending logic puzzler." - Chriswrites

FEATURES:
Solo game modes: Fast, Classic and Expert.
Online game mode: Multiplayer between two players.
Game mode for Color Blind people.
7 Leaderboards.
15 Achievements to earn.
Post scores to Facebook and Twitter.
